caption: Great service, clean and simple interior with outside seating as well in the front. Outside seating is dog friendly, they will even serve your pooch some water!  One arepa paired with the yucca fries is a solid meal. But you don’t have to stop there.  My partner and I took an order of tamal home to split for lunch the next day, was also really good! We kept it wrapped in the leaves and reheated it by steaming it.  I will be bringing friends here whenever they come to visit me in Williamsburg!

I can't recommend this place because it doesn't look like a Colombian restaurant; the amount of food is low, the food was cold and we found it not to be fresh. If it is true that it is a place of healthy food, they should report it because, for example, the "bandeja paisa" does not even come close to what is really a "bandeja paisa". The only thing I liked was the attention.
amazing food. they throw a nice play on traditional colombian food
Delicious and homemade

The food portions seems like a rip-off. I try traditional Colombian plater and charge $36 x 2. I didn’t even get a full sausage or chicharrón and it was an up charge o and only one 🥚.The food took a long time I think they were soaking the beans.  Note: I felt bad for my friend he paid $66 per 2 small plates. 😪
I came with my family and the food was amazing!!! The staff are very welcoming and the environment is very peaceful! I recommend this place anyone wanting to try Colombian food
Everything is delicious! Cant wait to try more stuff from this place!
Delicious! Had the tipica vegetarian arepa and unsweetened pineapple juice. What a joy to eat in a restaurant!

This place is absolutely delicious! Not only is the food and drink amazing, but the staff is so kind. Went here with my gf on Valentine's day and they gave us a heart-shaped Arepa on the house. So good :')

I received my online order just on time before the holidays. I ordered tamales and multigrain arepas. I couldn’t resist and I had tamal for breakfast its flavor and aroma took me back home. The seasoning is just perfect. I am very impressed with the quality and love in each product created by Palenque.
Great flavors. Love the empanadas.
Delicious healthy authentic Colombian food! Must try their tamal!
Delicious
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso
(Translated by Google) Excellent service  (Original) Excelente servicio

Great Colombian place, it has good flavors and good attitude with us every time. I’ve tried with my wife the bandeja paisa, empanadas, arepas... everything is really good. But for me the best one is the Ajiaco... it’s delicious!

We had the “papas criollas”, with the “arepa de chocolo”. The potatoes were just as I remember them from Colombia and were accompanied with a delicious “pink” chipotle sauce. The arepa de chocolo was extremely good, definitely had the right amount of sweetness. We also had the patacones which had a delicious guiso. The sweet plaintain with cheese and guava was cooked to perfection. But we have to say the real diva was the arepa ‘e huevo, which was even better than the original one due to the special dough. It is drool worthy.
(Translated by Google) Okay  (Original) Bueno
Amazing food! My friends and I are Colombian and we were very impressed about  the traditional dishes and also excited for the new healthy twists on other dishes. Highly recommended!
They take to long to get the order ready. I can't tell you about the food because I never try the food. Order and you will see it for your self
(Translated by Google) very good.  (Original) muy bueno.
(Translated by Google) Good service and delicious food  (Original) Buen servicio y comida rica

I love palenque. I have followed them since their food truck days and now the brick and motor location provides an ambience to enjoy their great food even more. My favorite arepa is the quinoa with beef, stacked all the way with all the sauces and fixings. I always feel at home with palenque. And I highly recommend bringing home frozen quinoa arepas. Such a great option for when your fridge is empty and you want to eat healthy. Buen provecho!
(Translated by Google) Nice local, happy with the service. Very good.  (Original) Bonito local, contento con el servicio. Muy bien.

Wow, so good. Great strong coffee, homemade arepas with a lot of love and care. Really great spot, we loved it. Chill vibes and prices are great. The empanadas are also epic, home made and so fresh. Definitely cured the hangover. The fiancée seems to complete full sentences after the breakfast here. Which is usually a plus.
Interesting twist to Colombian food.

*THE BEST COLOMBIAN IN BROOKLYN* A new take on colombian cuisine, one of its kind. The steak empanada is mouth watering, the shell is made out of quinoa and other delicious secret ingredients. This is redefined Colombian cuisine, with healthier ingredients better tasting dishes. I wish I could give more than 5 stars, nothing like this exists in New York. MUST GO!
Love this place!! I always order the beef empanadas and egg arepas. Nena the owner is awesome too! Very happy to have this cool Colombian spot in the neighborhood. Thank you Nena!
Nice place, healthy and tipical Colombian Food! Great service!

(Translated by Google) Please do you self a favor don't go to this place, very disappointed, tray paisa not even close to it .... do not eat in this place, if you are expecting an authentic Colombian food this is not the place, the tray paisa no it has nothing of the paisa tray (typical, national set) no avocado, no chicharrón, no arepa, cold beans, tasteless and lukewarm rice, supposedly the meat is angus and angus does not have my ears, a meat cut into pieces , bland, hard as a stone, and cold, four lettuce leaves and supposedly the charge for that is $ 18 dollars, the beef soup, a plate with potato pieces and a single piece of rib $ 10, the total of the account would be $ 28, dollars, when checking the statement of my bank SURPRISE they charged me $ 30.48 an extra $ 2.48 without prior notice, above all I was the only customer and I had to wait almost 20 minutes for the account! Enlarge a favor avoid this place if you don't want to have a bad experience !!!  (Original) Please do you self a favor don’t go to this place ,  very disappointed, bandeja paisa not even close to it .... no coma en este lugar , si espera una auténtica comida colombiana este no es el lugar , la bandeja paisa no tiene nada de la bandeja paisa (plató típico ,nacional) no aguacate , no chicharrón , no arepa , los frijoles fríos , el arroz desabrido y tibio , supuestamente la carne es angus y de angus no tiene mi las orejas , una carne cortada en pedazos , desabrida , dura como una piedra , y fría , cuatro hojas de lechuga y supuestamente el cargo por eso es de $18 dólares , la sopa de beef , un plato con pedazos de papa y un solo pedazo de costilla $10 dólares , el total de la cuenta sería $28 , dólares , al revisar el estado de cuenta de mi banco SORPRESA me cobraron $30,48 un extra de $2,48 sin previo aviso , encima de todo era el único cliente y tuve q esperar casi 20 minutos por la cuenta ! Agrande un favor evite este lugar si no kiere tener una mala experiencia!!!
Good food great service do not expect huge portions but the food was super tasty and flavorful.
Instant hit, really good clean food, and a great staff that was very accommodating. The empanadas are fire! You feel the love here. Will definitely be coming back!
The empanadas are insanely good, never had ones like these

Best gourmet arepas! Quinoa, multigrain or corn. Love the variety of gluten free!!! Delicious breakfast arepas and honestly  amazing empanadas! We could also order frozen products to make them at home.

Palenque’s products are delicious, tasty and healthy! I’ve tried the arepas (corn and quinoa), empanadas, steak and soup and they immediately became some of my favorite grocery items. Ordering is easy and delivery is quick!
Fine Spanish food
Best spot around for coffee or dining. Love the multigrain arepas ❤️❤️❤️
New place in Williamsburg! Delicious Colombian arepas and great vibes!!!
Healthy and delicious!!

Me and my family love Palenque’s arepas, which are unique - because they have options of other grains besides corn. We have a tradition already, breakfast arepa, they are powerful, delicious and filling. As well, I love the portobello empanadas with the cilantro sauce.
The multigrain arepa with chicken is my favorite one here. And the empanadas are so delicious and crispy - you'll want to get a whole pack of the mushroom ones! Can't wait to go back!
Palenque is a rare find. Their quinoa arepas are not only healthy, they're delicious. For authentic Colombian food and a relaxed vibe, I always go to Palenque.

I love this place! Healthy delicious Colombian food. I always get the costeña arepa on quinoa and is out of this world! Customer service is warm and welcoming, they always make you feel at home and the place is soooo beautiful inside! Nice addition to the neighborhood. Highly recommended.
Tasty Arepas and Coffee in Brooklyn! love their food and always have a nice time there.

Best Colombian this side of the Rio Magdalena, aka in Brooklyn. Palenque was our neighbors at many food markets in NYC, and I always enjoyed their tasty food and drinks, and would trade our crepes for some arepas and yuca fries! can't wait to go check out their new restaurant in Brooklyn. I also heard that they are open and have some tables outside! 10/10 recommend!

Haven't tried Palenque yet?? Don't wait, run there and try some delicious Colombian Food, arepas, empanadas, great coffee from Colombia too! Just found out they have outdoor seating and are open!! Best staff, always friendly and might even salsa dance with you.. 6ft apart of course :) can't wait to come again, cause I'm craving their empanadas and aguapanela

If you haven’t visit Palenque in east Williamsburg BK you should do it... Own by 2 amazing women, Palenque is a very good option if you are in the mood for super healthy and delicious Colombian food. Soups are amazing..!! And what I like the most; you can take home frozen packs of quinoa & multigrain arepas, empanadas and almojábanas.!!! What else can I say? Def check it out.

I love Palenque's food, the beautiful location in Brooklyn and the amazing love and care of its owners.  The arepa's are so good and healthy I always have some in reserve and whenever I can I go to the restaurant which has an amazing vibe.
Palenque has the healthiest Colombianfood that I have found in town. They are so kind and the space is beautiful! Happy they opened!!! I will definitely be there often!

this place ROCKS!!!  i've been eating their arepa's for a year now and have since noticed an increase in my vertical leap, my overall complexion has improved, i'm about 8% happier, and i find myself giggling on the subway for no apparent reason.   i've also become noticeably more handsome if that's even possible- as women and men both flock to me now.  wasn't like this last year and the only thing that's changed was me eating arepa's.  PALENQUE FOR LIFE!

Best Colombian food in NYC for the past 8 years!! Their Quinoa and Multigrain Arepas and Empanadas are absolutely delicious, their Soups like Ajiaco and Caldo de Costilla are the best in NYC!! Yummmmmmm and the service is so friendly they truly make you feel at home at their NEW Williamsburg location!! LOVE THEM! ❤️
Amazing home made food served fast and with love. Relaxed environment, cozy atmosphere.
-Food with vibes⚡️ mesmerizing-

This place is really incredible. The menu is basically gluten free and the food is delicious. Im not gluten free and I love the food here. But more than anything, the service is fantastic. There’s a real mom and pop vibe meets upscale trendy hipster spot. Everyone that works here is so warm and friendly. This is definitely my neighborhood go-to spot.

I’ve been a fan of palenque, since they had the food truck, and from all of the food markets they’ve done throughout NYC! The food, staff, vibes are great and I’m so glad they have a permanent location so we can enjoy it all year long! Delicious and nutritious 🇨🇴
The good is great and FINALLY a place with great service in Williamsburg. Tried the quinua arepas and the soups and o need more!
Good food, healthy, authentic and chic. Staff  and owners are very warm and friendly, in the heart of Williamsburg a great place to visit.
This place is AMAZING!! Srsly my new favorite place!
Delicious, authentic Colombian food. Such a welcomed addition to the neighborhood.

Delicious addition to the neighborhood. Careful though cause the food is heavy and you will want to eat allllll of it....you will eat till it hurts. But the food is tasty. (Those yuca fries..........)

(Translated by Google) I'm very happy and excited to see you guys with your permanent restaurant but not surprised you guys babe and viví are hard working women that work with passion and love. I really really recommend. Palenque Colombian food it’s organic and Real food make with LOVE ❤️  I wish you all the good of the world very happy to look at the restaurant who loves them and wishes you the best in the world  a bad jeiry employee  (Original) I’m very happy and excited to see you guys with your permanent restaurant but not surprised you guys nena and viví are hard working women that work with passion and love. I really really recommend. Excellent service and food. Reminds me of when i was back home. The arepas are really full of flavor and culture that is hard to find else where.

Amazing food and atmosphere! Being Colombian, I love arepas and Palenque’s are just something very special. All of the ingredients are super fresh and delicious, the atmosphere is super friendly and the place is super cute. Will be back for sure :)
Love this place, one of my favorite restaurants in NY! Organic and home made Colombian food. Beautiful people, delicious food and loving the vibes.

(Translated by Google) Deliiiiii healthy food but it tastes good and feels good. You could eat me all the chicken and mushroom empanadas, they are exquisite  (Original) Deliiiiii comida saludable pero que sabe bien y se siente bien.
